alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 12:16PM EST until January 06 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Grant and Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will likely blow down scattered trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible. Loose outdoor objects may be blown away or damaged.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Pendleton
